title: The average high iron game
body:
me: Picks a scaling champion

team is losing by a few kills early

team gives up

i scale and am bringing us back

team is so toxic and tilted they WILL BE RIGHT that we are losing even if they have to lose on purpose to make it so

how are people this mentally weak? I don't even mind having to carry 4 people to LP that they do not on any planet deserve, i just want out and Riot now auto-places every new account in iron so i have no choice, annoying start to the season
